Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Paulina
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via: Diversey, Ashland, Belmont, Damen, Diversey, due to, street blockage, near Diversey/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Diversey, Ashland, Belmont, Damen, Diversey, due to, street blockage, near Diversey/Paulina.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Damen
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Damen due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Damen due to a door problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
